Table 4.   Justice system expenditure by activity, character, and object, State and level of government, fiscal 1997
Notes:  Local government data are estimates subject to variability.
a/ For each State and the United States summary, the expenditure figures shown on the "Local, total" lines and the combined
State-local total lines (opposite each State's name) exclude duplicative intergovernmental transactions.  Thus, the
"Local, total" lines include intergovernmental payments only to the State government and the combined State-local total
